CT REIA, Mark Klee, and Caryn McKinney presents:
Where do Bankruptcies really fit into the Investing Puzzle

August 16 - 5:30 to 9:00 PM
Crowne Plaza Hotel. 100 Berlin Road. Cromwell, CT
FREE for CTREIA and AOACT members | $30 for guests

Register For This Event

Never before offered in Connecticut: Bankruptcy Goldmine!

* Are you tired of fighting for the same old FSBOs, MLS listings, and foreclosures?
* Are you wishing you could be on the front of a NEW tidal wave in real estate investing?
* Do you dream of finding a niche market that most investors are too intimidated to explore?

Well, search no more. That's exactly what Mark and Caryn have to offer you.

What You Will Learn
* How to shortcut the "discovery" process and go straight to the best opportunities - before they post for the public?
* Which is "better"... Chapter 7 or Chapter 13 (and why)
* How to work with mortgage companies? (They are more motivated than ever before)
* Key Strategies (and well kept secrets) for negotiating the public bankruptcy records?
* The 4 easy ways to profit with bankruptcies? (You will actually see real life deals and details)

About Mark Klee and Caryn McKinney
Mark Klee and Caryn McKinney are the two founding partners of The Post-Bankruptcy Report. Mark comes from a corporate background and Caryn spent her 'first career' as a professional racquetball player, attaining a #1 world ranking. They now have a combined investing experience of over 20 years and have both been investing full-time for the past ten years. About seven years ago, Mark and Caryn began delving into pre-foreclosures and soon thereafter discovered a large niche that many investors seem to be afraid of bankruptcies. The more they learned, the higher their profits soared!

Now, Mark and Caryn are a national voice on bankruptcies as they share their experience and knowledge across the country. Their easy-going, straight-forward approach to teaching what investors need to know about this untapped lead-generaton niche comes from "in the trenches," real-life experience. Investors are thrilled to discover that it is possible to "remove the fear," simplify bankruptcies, and use this untapped market as a resource for a consistent and reliable source of income!

Most notably, Mark and Caryn have developed a new, 4-CD audio/video product to assist investors in any market in finding the incredible leads available through this bankruptcy niche... from the comfort of a home computer. So if you want to check out a valuable, non-competitive niche like bankruptcies, you're in the right place.
